/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy traffic typical of city life.
